title: FELIPE VILLAMOR and SHEILA CORONEL
content:
EDITED: Reg Chua (Exec Editor of Reuters is Sheila Coronel's partner. Reg Chua is an advisory Board member of Open Society Foundation of Soros) 


Habang sinusubukan kong i trace kung sino ang tao sa likod ng pseudonym na "FELIPE VILLAMOR" (writer ng sandamakmak na negative articles on Duterte), ako'y naligaw sa pangalang, "SHEILA CORONEL".


Grabe! Bigatin pala siya. She's way up there...Eto lamang ang mga positions niya sa iba't ibang SOROS funded organizations:


MEDIA DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT FUND  - www.mdif.org


Omidyar Network  - Investor

Open Society Foundations (George Soros)  - Investor

Aryeh Neier - Previous Chair

Sasa Vucinic (North Base Media) - Previous Chair 

Sheila Coronel - Vice Chairman

-----------------------


INTERNATIONAL CRISIS GROUP - www.crisisgroup.org


Lord (Mark) Malloch-Brown* -  Co-Chair 

George Soros - Trustee

 Sheila Coronel - Trustee


*Lord Mark Malloch-Brown was the Campaign Strategist of Cory Aquino and is currently the Smartmatic (PCOS***) Chairman

-----------------------


PHILIPPINE CENTER FOR INVESTIGATIVE JOURNALISM - pcij.org


Open Society Foundations/George Soros - Funder

Malou C. Mangahas - Executive Director

Sheila Coronel - Co-founder and former director   


-----------------------


GLOBAL INVESTIGATIVE JOURNALISM NETWORK - gijn.org


PCIJ of Sheila Coronel - Founding Member 

Open Society Foundations/George Soros - Funder

Omidyar Network  - Funder

Sheila Coronel - Donor


-----------------------


INTERNATIONAL CONSORTIUM OF INVESTIGATIVE JOURNALISTS - icij.org


Omidyar Network  - Funder    

Open Society Foundations/George Soros  - Funder

PCIJ of Sheila Coronel - Partner


-----------------------


OPEN SOCIETY FOUNDATIONS


Reginald Chua - Partner of  Sheila Coronel/Executive Editor at Thomson Reuters and Advisory Board Member of Open Society Foundation


Aryeh Neier - President - Emeritus

George Soros - Founder/Chairman

Lord Mark Malloch-Brown - Global Board Member

Samantha Power - Consultant


-----------------------


COLUMBIA SCHOOL OF JOURNALISM


Open Society Foundations/George Soros  - Funder


Walt Bogdanich - Adjunct Faculty / 

- Assistant editor, The New York Times Investigations Desk


Sarah Cohen  - Adjunct Faculty / 

- Head of the computer-assisted reporting, The New York Times


Duff Wilson  - Adjunct Faculty / 

- Associate editor, Reuters‚Äô New Global Enterprise Unit

RAPPLER


Omidyar Network  - Investor

Sasa Vucinic (North Base Media) - Investor

Maritess Vitug - Editor 

Glenda Gloria - Vice President

Maria Ressa - CEO & Executive Editor

Malou C. Mangahas - Contributor 

 

-----------------------

SMARTMATIC (PCOS machines)


Lord Mark Malloch-Brown - Chairman


-----------------------


HUMAN RIGHTS WATCH

Aryeh Neier - Former Executive director and Founder of Human Rights Watch 

Open Society Foundations/George Soros  - Funder

Open Society Foundations/George Soros  -  Funder
